name: Attila the Hun
what_did:
Attila was the ruler of the Huns, a powerful group of warriors.
He led many battles against the Roman Empire and was feared across Europe.
He wanted to make his people strong and rich by taking land and treasure.
why_matters:
Attila became one of the most famous warrior leaders in history.
Even though he caused fear, he showed how strong leaders could change empires.
His name is still known over 1,500 years later.

questions.q: How long ago did Attila live?

fun_fact: Some people called him the ‘Scourge of God’ because he scared so many rulers!
